programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: Premiere. A recently released ex-convict becomes involved with a woman married to an abusive husband. Drama, starring Elisabeth Moss, Waleed Zuaiter and Octavia Spencer.

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.

programme.title: Double Date
programme.desc: Premiere. A 29-year-old virgin and his extrovert mate get more than they bargained for when they meet beautiful sisters with a hidden agenda. Comedy thriller, starring Danny Morgan, Georgia Groome and Michael Socha.

programme.desc: A look at Steven Spielberg's sci-fi adventure based on Ernest Cline's book, starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke and Ben Mendelsohn.

programme.title: Wilson

programme.title: Shin Godzilla
programme.desc: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Hiroki Hasegawa, Yutaka Takenouchi and Satomi Ishihara.(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A successful investment banker is left devastated by the death of his wife. A complaint to a vending machine company sets him off on a letter-writing campaign in which he makes a series of brutally honest personal admissions, providing him with the chance to make a fresh start in his life - as soon as he has finished destroying everything that used to matter to him. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Naomi Watts and Chris Cooper.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
programme.desc: Three women rent a luxurious New York apartment as part of a scheme to get their claws into wealthy husbands - but their plans become unstuck when all three start to fall for men with good hearts and empty pockets. Comedy, starring Betty Grable, Marilyn Monroe, Lauren Bacall, William Powell, Cameron Mitchell, David Wayne, Rory Calhoun and Fred Clark.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: The ghost of a daredevil pilot who was killed while fighting a raging forest fire is unable to rest until he helps his successor face the challenges of the job - and persuade his heartbroken girlfriend to accept her loss and move on with her life. Romantic fantasy, directed by Steven Spielberg and starring Richard Dreyfuss, Holly Hunter, John Goodman and Audrey Hepburn.

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: An impoverished family is taken in by a relative - and while sensible elder daughter Elinor's love for the sensitive Edward Ferrars meets with disapproval from his family, her more passionate younger sister Marianne engages in a disastrous romance with an infamous womaniser. Period drama based on Jane Austen's novel, directed by Ang Lee and starring Emma Thompson, Kate Winslet, Alan Rickman and Hugh Grant.

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
programme.desc: A determined salesman takes custody of his five-year-old son when his wife leaves him, and secures an unpaid internship with a renowned stockbroking firm. However, the lack of a steady income begins to take its toll on the pair, leading to eviction from their home and a daily struggle to support themselves. Gabriele Muccino's fact-based drama, starring Will Smith alongside his son Jaden. With Thandie Newton, Brian Howe, James Karen, Dan Castellaneta and Kurt Fuller.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: Honey 3: Dare to Dance
programme.desc: A hip-hop inspired performance of Romeo and Juliet in Cape Town is threatened by tensions among the cast. Dance drama sequel, starring Cassie Ventura, Kenny Wormald and Dena Kaplan.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Biopic of the brilliant American mathematician John Nash, whose prospects of a promising career with the CIA were confounded by paranoid delusions and schizophrenia as the stress of the job proved too much of a burden. Oscar-winning drama, starring Russell Crowe, Jennifer Connelly, Ed Harris, Judd Hirsch, Paul Bettany and Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: A high-school dropout in the 1970s lands a job with a leading hardcore porn director, and is thrown into a strange world inhabited by bizarre characters - only to find fame and fortune come at a price. Drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Burt Reynolds, Julianne Moore, William H Macy, Heather Graham and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: Alive
programme.desc: A plane carrying a college rugby team smashes into a mountain in the Andes, leaving the survivors stranded in unbearably bleak conditions. As supplies dwindle, they are faced with the horrifying prospect of eating their dead to ensure they make it through the ordeal. Fact-based drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Vincent Spano and Josh Hamilton.

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell.

programme.title: Roustabout
programme.desc: A leather-clad drifter with a talent for all things tuneful joins a travelling carnival, and catches the eye of a co-worker - but her father is less less than keen on the relationship, leading to trouble. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Barbara Stanwyck, Joan Freeman, Leif Erickson and Sue Ann Langdon.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: A youth probation officer at a maximum-security detention centre is determined to teach the adolescents in his care that they have a chance to turn their lives around. In a bid to boost morale, he helps the inmates form an American football team. Fact-based sports drama, starring Dwayne Johnson, L Scott Caldwell, Leon Rippy and Xzibit.

programme.title: I'll See You in My Dreams
programme.desc: A retired widow leads a quiet life, but when her dog dies, she finds herself feeling unfulfilled, and decides she needs to broaden her horizons with fresh experiences. She strikes up a friendship with a handyman, and reluctantly attends a speed dating event, where she becomes open to the possibility of a new romance. Comedy drama, starring Blythe Danner, Martin Starr, Sam Elliott and Malin Akerman.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV host and his producer are held hostage live on air by a man who lost everything after following their advice. Crime thriller, with George Clooney and Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A Marine serving in Iraq finds a photograph of a woman belonging to an unknown fellow soldier, and considers it his good luck charm. When he returns to America, he decides to track her down, and after taking a job at her family's boarding kennels, falls in love with her. Romantic drama, with Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling and Blythe Danner.

programme.title: A Mighty Heart
programme.desc: Drama based on journalist Mariane Pearl's account of her husband Daniel's kidnapping and murder by a militant group. Mariane was pregnant when she travelled with him to Pakistan. When he disappeared without trace, the frantic search for him turned into a media frenzy. Starring Angelina Jolie, Dan Futterman and Archie Panjabi.

programme.title: Away
programme.desc: In Blackpool, an unlikely friendship blossoms between a lonely, suicidal widower and a young woman trying to escape an abusive ex-boyfriend. Drama, starring Timothy Spall, Juno Temple and Matt Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Zorba the Greek
programme.desc: A timid English writer arrives in Crete to open a mine for the family business and falls under the spell of a local peasant with a charismatic and inspiring zest for life. Drama, starring Anthony Quinn, Alan Bates, Irene Papas, Lila Kedrova and Sotiris Moustakas.(n)

programme.title: Being Charlie
programme.desc: Forced into rehab by his parents, rebellious 18-year-old Charlie encounters another troubled youth, the beautiful Eva. Drama, starring Nick Robinson, Morgan Saylor, Common and Cary Elwes.(n)

programme.title: A Passage to India
programme.desc: A headstrong upper-class Englishwoman accuses an Indian doctor of sexual assault when she visits India for the first time, exposing snobbery and inter-racial tensions during the British Raj. David Lean's period drama, adapted from the EM Forster novel, starring Judy Davis, Victor Banerjee, Peggy Ashcroft, Alec Guinness, Nigel Havers, James Fox, Art Malik and Saeed Jaffrey.(n)

programme.title: Heartburn
programme.desc: A cookery writer falls in love with a reporter she meets at a wedding, and gets married. She sacrifices her career to devote herself to family life, but during her second pregnancy, she becomes aware her husband is having an affair. Mike Nichols' comedy drama, starring Meryl Streep, Jack Nicholson, Jeff Daniels, Maureen Stapleton and Stockard Channing, and featuring Kevin Spacey in his movie debut.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: During the Second World War, German businessman Oskar Schindler strives to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga.(n)

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A Warsaw animal lover risks her life by helping to shield hundreds of Jews from the Nazis. True-life drama, starring Jessica Chastain, Johan Heldenbergh and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: During the Second World War, German businessman Oskar Schindler strives to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Airplane II: The Sequel
programme.desc: Hapless hero Ted Striker tries to prevent the launch of a passenger space shuttle, certain it will end in disaster. Sadly, his prediction comes true when a computer malfunction sends the spacecraft hurtling toward the sun, while a man driven mad by sexual inadequacy smuggles a bomb on board. Disaster movie spoof sequel, starring Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Lloyd Bridges, William Shatner, Sonny Bono and Chad Everett.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: A family gather to bury the patriarch, but any dignity to the occasion soon disappears in a run of disasters. The deceased's oldest son resents the success of his younger brother, while their sister's boyfriend has accidentally taken LSD and an unexpected guest has a few shock revelations to make. Comedy, with Chris Rock, Martin Lawrence, Zoe Saldana and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Don't Think Twice
programme.desc: Turmoil strikes a New York improv troupe when one member leaves to star in a Saturday Night Live-style TV show. Comedy, starring Keegan-Michael Key and Gillian Jacobs.

programme.title: Ready Player One: Special
programme.desc: A look at Steven Spielberg's sci-fi adventure based on Ernest Cline's book, starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke and Ben Mendelsohn.

programme.title: Revenge of the Nerds
programme.desc: Two social outcasts set up their own college fraternity for similarly un-hip students to give the campus sporting jocks a run for their money. Comedy, starring Anthony Edwards, Robert Carradine, Ted McGinley and Timothy Busfield.

programme.title: All About Steve
programme.desc: A single crossword compiler goes on a blind date with a news cameraman and is instantly smitten, but he is less keen. When her infatuation gets her fired from her job, she devotes herself to pursuing him across America, determined to convince him they are meant for each other. Romantic comedy, with Sandra Bullock, Bradley Cooper and Thomas Haden Church.

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Three kids fall foul of the local bully on their first day at high school, so they advertise for a bodyguard. They end up hiring a man who turns out to be a low-rent mercenary, but discover their new-found protector is not quite the hardened soldier of fortune he claims to be. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Leslie Mann, Nate Hartley and Troy Gentile.

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: A thoroughly ordinary man is hurled into an intergalactic adventure when Earth is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace bypass. Luckily, his friend, who turns out to be an alien, gives him a handy travel guide to help him make sense of the universe. Sci-fi comedy based on Douglas Adams' classic series, with Martin Freeman, Bill Nighy, Mos Def, Zooey Deschanel and Sam Rockwell. Stephen Fry is the guide's narrator.

programme.title: Chips: Law and Disorder
programme.desc: A maverick FBI agent working undercover in the California Highway Patrol is partnered with a complete rookie. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dax Shepard, Michael Pena and Vincent D'Onofrio.

programme.title: Here Comes the Boom
programme.desc: A biology teacher discovers his school is planning to save money by closing down the music department, leaving his friend out of a job. He puts his college wrestling skills to use and becomes a mixed martial arts fighter, hoping to win enough money to put things right and gain hero status with his students in the process. Comedy, starring Kevin James, Salma Hayek and Henry Winkler.

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: A failed rock star carves out a career as a popular wedding singer, but his hopes for a bright future are dashed when his fiancee jilts him at the altar and he tries to shut himself off from the outside world. At one of his functions, a waitress catches his eye - but unfortunately for him, she is already engaged to someone else. Romantic comedy set in the 1980s, starring Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad
programme.desc: While investigating the shooting of a colleague, disaster-prone police lieutenant Frank Drebin uncovers a plot to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II during her visit to Los Angeles. However, after he is sacked from the force by the mayor, the cop has to operate beneath the radar to get to the bottom of the conspiracy. Comedy, with Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley and Ricardo Montalban.

programme.title: Chips: Law and Disorder
programme.desc: A maverick FBI agent working undercover in the California Highway Patrol is partnered with a complete rookie. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dax Shepard, Michael Pena and Vincent D'Onofrio.

programme.title: Here Comes the Boom
programme.desc: A biology teacher discovers his school is planning to save money by closing down the music department, leaving his friend out of a job. He puts his college wrestling skills to use and becomes a mixed martial arts fighter, hoping to win enough money to put things right and gain hero status with his students in the process. Comedy, starring Kevin James, Salma Hayek and Henry Winkler.

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A college's most slobbish and unruly student fraternity faces expulsion for upsetting the rigid social order of the campus, so its madcap members plan one final act of rebellion against the college dean and a preppy bunch of snobbish bullies at the annual university homecoming parade. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Tim Matheson, Donald Sutherland, Karen Allen and Tom Hulce.

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: A washed-up and embittered baseball player struggles with bad memories of a failed sports career. When his exasperated lawyer suggests he coach a losing Little-League team, he begins to turn himself and the youngsters into a force to be reckoned with. Richard Linklater's remake of the 1970s comedy, starring Billy Bob Thornton, Greg Kinnear, Marcia Gay Harden and Emmanuel Estrada.

programme.title: Licence to Drive
programme.desc: A teenager promises the girl of his dreams he will take her out in his grandfather's treasured vintage car, even though he has just failed his driving test - leading to a whole host of mishaps and scrapes. Comedy, starring Corey Haim, Corey Feldman, Carol Kane and Heather Graham.

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: A harassed publisher faces several unexpected set-backs on the way to his wedding - including a chance encounter with a vivacious woman, who only adds to his confusion as he begins to feel stirrings of love for her. Romantic comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Ben Affleck, Maura Tierney, Steve Zahn, Blythe Danner and Ronny Cox.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: A teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the school's dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen.

programme.title: Get Him to the Greek
programme.desc: A record company employee is given the dubious task of making sure a manic, sex-crazed British rock star gets from London to his comeback concert in Los Angeles without causing too much mayhem along the way. His task is made all the more difficult by his charge's infatuation with a model. Comedy, with Russell Brand reprising his role from Forgetting Sarah Marshall alongside Jonah Hill and Rose Byrne.

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican woman is offered a well-paid job as housekeeper to a wealthy American celebrity chef, and relocates with her daughter to Los Angeles - but her employer's neurotic wife causes all sorts of problems. Comedy directed by James L Brooks, starring Paz Vega, Adam Sandler, Tea Leoni and Cloris Leachman.

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
programme.desc: Blundering cop Frank Drebin discovers a secret conspiracy to kidnap a renowned solar energy expert and replace him with an imposter. As he sets out to bring the perpetrators to justice, he is unexpectedly reunited with an old flame. Slapstick comedy sequel, starring Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley, George Kennedy, Richard Griffiths and OJ Simpson.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: A teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the school's dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen.

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican woman is offered a well-paid job as housekeeper to a wealthy American celebrity chef, and relocates with her daughter to Los Angeles - but her employer's neurotic wife causes all sorts of problems. Comedy directed by James L Brooks, starring Paz Vega, Adam Sandler, Tea Leoni and Cloris Leachman.

programme.title: Get Him to the Greek
programme.desc: A record company employee is given the dubious task of making sure a manic, sex-crazed British rock star gets from London to his comeback concert in Los Angeles without causing too much mayhem along the way. His task is made all the more difficult by his charge's infatuation with a model. Comedy, with Russell Brand reprising his role from Forgetting Sarah Marshall alongside Jonah Hill and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: This Is Spinal Tap
programme.desc: An ageing British rock band try to revive their fortunes by embarking on a US tour, with a film-maker on hand to record the mayhem. However, the big comeback soon turns into a series of disasters as tensions between the clueless rockers and their long-suffering manager reach breaking point. Spoof documentary, starring Michael McKean, Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer and Rob Reiner.(n)

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: A family purchases a robot servant to perform menial tasks but quickly realises this is no ordinary droid when he begins to develop human emotions and the capacity to think for himself, a quality encouraged by his owner's children. He asks for his freedom, and spends the next 200 years struggling to come to terms with its humanity. Chris Columbus's sci-fi drama inspired by the books of Isaac Asimov, starring Robin Williams, Sam Neill, Embeth Davidtz and Oliver Platt.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Two college graduates faced with the prospect of deciding what to do with their lives find themselves faced with a more immediate crisis - getting and keeping a job. Their search for employment takes them through a succession of strange experiences and even stranger workplaces. Comedy, starring Miles Teller, Anna Kendrick, Bryan Cranston and Alison Brie.(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Ambitious journalist Alison's one-night stand with directionless layabout Ben has unexpected consequences when she discovers she is pregnant. However, the unlikely parents decide to give the relationship a try for their baby's sake, forcing Ben to face the challenge of accepting responsibility for the first time in his life. Romantic comedy, starring Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl and Paul Rudd.(n)

programme.title: The Waterboy
programme.desc: An American football team's waterboy puts up with constant ridicule from the players. But one day his anger gets the better of him and he demonstrates an unexpected talent for tackling - so the coach gives him a chance to prove his worth on the pitch. However, he has to keep his blossoming sporting career a secret from his overprotective mother. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Kathy Bates, Henry Winkler and Fairuza Balk.(n)

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: The chauvinistic host of a top-rated American news programme in 1970s San Diego fights for his status and job security when both are threatened by the arrival of an ambitious female reporter, whose determination to become a newsreader leads to a bitter battle of the sexes. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Fred Willard and Steve Carell.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: A small-time crook hopes to fund a business venture by having his father killed and claiming an inheritance, but finds hiring a hitman is too expensive. He and his sidekick resort to kidnapping a pizza delivery boy, attaching a bomb to him and sending him off to rob a bank on their behalf. However, the scheme does not go to plan. Comedy adventure, with Jesse Eisenberg and Danny McBride.(n)

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Singleton Jane is literally always the bridesmaid and never the bride, a role she assumes for the 28th time when her sister announces she is getting married - to a man Jane is secretly in love with. As she wrestles with her feelings, Jane's predicament attracts the attention of a reporter fascinated by her story. Romantic comedy, starring Katherine Heigl, James Marsden and Malin Akerman.(n)

programme.title: The Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult
programme.desc: Inept police detective Frank Drebin plans to retire from the force, but is lured back by the opportunity to foil a terrorist plot. Going undercover in prison, he sets out to prevent an evil mastermind from escaping and carrying out his fiendish plan - to bomb the Oscar awards ceremony. Comedy sequel, starring Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley, OJ Simpson, George Kennedy and Fred Ward.(n)

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: The chauvinistic host of a top-rated American news programme in 1970s San Diego fights for his status and job security when both are threatened by the arrival of an ambitious female reporter, whose determination to become a newsreader leads to a bitter battle of the sexes. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Fred Willard and Steve Carell.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: A small-time crook hopes to fund a business venture by having his father killed and claiming an inheritance, but finds hiring a hitman is too expensive. He and his sidekick resort to kidnapping a pizza delivery boy, attaching a bomb to him and sending him off to rob a bank on their behalf. However, the scheme does not go to plan. Comedy adventure, with Jesse Eisenberg and Danny McBride.(n)

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: High-kicking teenager Daniel accompanies his venerable mentor Mr Miyagi when he returns to the Japanese province of Okinawa to visit his dying father. However, an old rival of Miyagi's is waiting for them, while Daniel is drawn into a vicious conflict with their enemy's own karate protege. Martial arts sequel, starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Yuji Okumoto.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco and Rosemary Harris.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Teenager Peter Parker, aka Spider-Man, must protect New York City from a menacing new villain, the Vulture. However, he does get a helping hand from Iron Man. Superhero adventure, starring Tom Holland, Michael Keaton and Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: Spider-Man

Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: A talented martial arts expert gets entangled with a tenacious undercover reporter as he takes part in an illegal fighting tournament, where the last man standing wins the day - and the losers usually end up in the cemetery. Action adventure, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Donald Gibb, Leah Ayres, Norman Burton and Roy Chiao.

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic warrior risks his life to protect a female android who holds the key to curing a man-made plague devastating humanity. However, a host of bloodthirsty warriors are determined to stop them getting to the scientists who need the information. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dayle Haddon, Deborah Richter and Vincent Klyn.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: The resurrected warrior battles for survival against a host of supercharged troops controlled by an insane computerised opponent. Action adventure sequel, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Michael Jai White, Heidi Schanz and Kiana Tom.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on the Sky Cinema channels, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Pele: Birth Of A Legend
programme.desc: Biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. Starring Kevin de Paula, Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro.

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: The Great Wall: Special
programme.desc: A look at the epic action adventure starring Matt Damon, Pedro Pascal and Willem Dafoe.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
programme.desc: A crazed CIA agent based in Mexico learns of a conspiracy involving a drug baron and a military general to assassinate the president. He finds the perfect man to prevent the coup in the shape of a legendary gunslinger, who is seeking revenge on the general for murdering his wife. Action thriller, concluding Robert Rodriguez's El Mariachi trilogy, starring Antonio Banderas, Johnny Depp, Willem Dafoe, Mickey Rourke and Salma Hayek.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche.

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: While en route to Mexico, a mysterious drifter and his dog run afoul of the thugs running a dead-end mining town. Western, starring Ethan Hawke, John Travolta and Karen Gillan.

programme.title: Pele: Birth Of A Legend
programme.desc: Biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. Starring Kevin de Paula, Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro.

programme.title: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: A reconnaissance pilot is shot down and becomes stranded in enemy territory after filming evidence of a genocidal massacre by Serb militia in Bosnia. The naval air commander for Nato forces in the Balkans defies orders by mounting an unauthorised mission to rescue him, while the airman faces a battle to stay alive as he is pursued by paramilitary forces. Bosnian War drama, starring Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson, Gabriel Macht and Olek Krupa.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche.

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: While en route to Mexico, a mysterious drifter and his dog run afoul of the thugs running a dead-end mining town. Western, starring Ethan Hawke, John Travolta and Karen Gillan.

He finds the perfect man to prevent the coup in the shape of a legendary gunslinger, who is seeking revenge on the general for murdering his wife. Action thriller, concluding Robert Rodriguez's El Mariachi trilogy, starring Antonio Banderas, Johnny Depp, Willem Dafoe, Mickey Rourke and Salma Hayek.(n)

A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: The Great Wall: Special
programme.desc: A look at the epic action adventure starring Matt Damon, Pedro Pascal and Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Mechanic Cade Yeager continues his fight against the evil Decepticons in a battle which takes him to England. There he joins forces with an eccentric knight and a literature professor. Fantasy adventure, starring Mark Wahlberg, Laura Haddock, Josh Duhamel and Anthony Hopkins.(n)

programme.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
programme.desc: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins.(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary computer salesman leads a double life as a secret agent battling international terrorism. His naive wife is unaware of his dual employment, and goes in search of adventure - only to end up in the clutches of terrorists who have stolen a nuclear weapon. James Cameron's action comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis and Tom Arnold.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Mechanic Cade Yeager continues his fight against the evil Decepticons in a battle which takes him to England. There he joins forces with an eccentric knight and a literature professor. Fantasy adventure, starring Mark Wahlberg, Laura Haddock, Josh Duhamel and Anthony Hopkins.(n)

programme.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
programme.desc: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. Action thriller, starring Scott Adkins.(n)

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: A small-time private eye uncovers a gruesome secret when he investigates the husband of a wealthy socialite. As he is drawn deeper into the tangled web of lies and corruption, the case becomes ever more complicated. Roman Polanski's Oscar-winning mystery, starring Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston and Perry Lopez.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger is hired to defend a remote frontier town from three outlaws who are making people's lives a misery. Although he rids the community of the troublemakers, the residents' lives take a turn for the worse as their saviour seizes control of the town and seeks to punish them for their past sins. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Verna Bloom and Marianna Hill.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon
programme.desc: A gold prospector buys a wife from a Mormon and agrees to share her with his mining partner when she insists they all live together. Mindful that her presence in an all-male town might give rise to jealousy, he hijacks a stagecoach carrying six working girls and opens a brothel in town. Oscar-nominated musical Western, starring Lee Marvin, Clint Eastwood, with Jean Seberg and Harve Presnell.

programme.title: The Greatest Show on Earth
programme.desc: A circus owner hires a celebrated trapeze artist to perform with his girlfriend as the star attraction - leading to bitter rivalry in the air and sexual tension on the ground. Meanwhile, a clown tries to keep his past a secret, and racketeers prepare to muscle in on the concessions. Cecil B DeMille's Oscar-winning drama, starring Charlton Heston, Cornel Wilde, Betty Hutton and James Stewart.

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: The relationship between the powerful King of Siam and a widowed English schoolteacher, recruited to tutor his wives and many children, begins with restrained hostility - but gradually gives way to more tender feelings. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Deborah Kerr, Yul Brynner, Rita Moreno, Martin Benson and Terry Saunders.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook assembles a motley gang to steal £4million in gold bullion from an Italian armoured car, which brings Turin to a standstill and enables the robbers to make a quick getaway in a fleet of Minis - but they end up falling foul of the Mafia along the way. Crime comedy, starring Michael Caine, Noel Coward, Benny Hill, Tony Beckley and John Le Mesurier.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss ends up at an isolated motel, where the owner's curious relationship with his domineering mother results in murder. Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook assembles a motley gang to steal £4million in gold bullion from an Italian armoured car, which brings Turin to a standstill and enables the robbers to make a quick getaway in a fleet of Minis - but they end up falling foul of the Mafia along the way. Crime comedy, starring Michael Caine, Noel Coward, Benny Hill, Tony Beckley and John Le Mesurier.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss ends up at an isolated motel, where the owner's curious relationship with his domineering mother results in murder. Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: Two tough New York cops use unorthodox methods to try to break an international drug ring. When their information leads them to place a candy store under surveillance, they discover the owners are the American agents for a French kingpin planning to ship millions of dollars worth of heroin into the US. Oscar-winning fact-based thriller, starring Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey and Tony Lo Bianco.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: Hard-nosed New York narcotics cop Popeye Doyle pursues a drug dealer to his lair in Marseille. However, he soon lives to regret his decision when he is captured by the criminal and subjected to a cruel revenge by being forcibly addicted to heroin. John Frankenheimer's thriller sequel, starring Gene Hackman, Fernando Rey, Bernard Fresson, Jean-Pierre Castaldi and Charles Millot.

programme.title: Carousel
programme.desc: A criminal struggling to support his pregnant wife dies during a botched armed robbery, but is given the chance to return to life 15 years later to help his family and teach his daughter a valuable lesson. Adaptation of Rodgers and Hammerstein's musical, starring Gordon MacRae, Shirley Jones, Cameron Mitchell, Barbara Ruick and Gene Lockhart.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: A naval nurse falls in love with a French plantation owner on an American-held island during the Second World War. However, dark secrets surface from his past and result in her having to leave the colony and embark on a perilous mission with the help of a US Navy officer. Romantic musical based on the Rodgers and Hammerstein Broadway show, with Mitzi Gaynor, Rossano Brazzi, John Kerr and Ray Walston.

programme.title: Wings
programme.desc: Silent epic set during the First World War, the winner of the first Best Picture Oscar, telling the story of two fighter pilots who are both in love with the same woman. Richard Arlen and Charles Rogers star as the rivals, with Clara Bow as the object of their affections.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson.

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Scientists detect a mysterious black monolith on the moon is transmitting a signal to Jupiter. A spacecraft is sent on a mission to investigate the origins of the strange object, but as they near their destination, the astronauts realise the computer controlling the ship is turning against them. Stanley Kubrick's sci-fi epic, with Keir Dullea, William Sylvester, Gary Lockwood and Leonard Rossiter.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: An American student is arrested for drug smuggling while on holiday in Turkey, and thrown into a brutal prison ruled by a sadistic warder. His family and the US government plan an appeal, but he begins to realise that diplomatic efforts are fruitless, and his only hope is to plot a desperate escape. Alan Parker's fact-based drama, starring Brad Davis, John Hurt and Randy Quaid.(n)

programme.title: Easy Rider
programme.desc: Two hippie bikers travel across America on their way to the Mardi Gras in New Orleans. In their quest to find a different way of living, they encounter other similarly nonconformist souls, including a disillusioned lawyer who ends up travelling with them, but also come up against bigotry and intolerance. Drama, directed by and starring Dennis Hopper, with Peter Fonda, Jack Nicholson and Phil Spector.(n)

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama chronicling the planning and execution of the Allied landings in Normandy on June 6, 1944, from the differing perspectives of the British, German and American forces. Starring Richard Burton, Richard Todd, Kenneth More, John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, Henry Fonda and Curt Jurgens.(n)

programme.title: The Sound of Music
programme.desc: A cheerful novice nun is employed as governess to the seven children of an austere widower. As she brings light, laughter and a love of all things harmonious to a family previously beset by grief and strict discipline she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer and Eleanor Parker.(n)

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: An ageing gunfighter is drawn into the conflict between a land-grabbing cattle baron and a ranching family, but gets wounded in the process. A year later, he returns to town to find the situation has not improved - so along with his sidekick and the drunken town sheriff, he fights to defend the family from its enemies. Western, starring John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, James Caan and Ed Asner.(n)

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: A slave trained to fight as a gladiator turns against his masters and leads an army of rebels in a fight for freedom against the Roman state. But as the rebellion gathers momentum, two senators do all they can to exploit the uprising for their own political ends. Stanley Kubrick's Oscar-winning epic, with Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Laurence Olivier, Jean Simmons, Charles Laughton and Peter Ustinov.(n)

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: An enigmatic British Army officer tries to unite the Arab nations against the Turks during the First World War, but comes into conflict with the military authorities when he engages the enemy with guerrilla tactics instead of more conventional methods. However, his increasingly torn loyalties leave him close to madness. Oscar-winning epic drama directed by David Lean, starring Peter O'Toole, Omar Sharif, Anthony Quinn, Alec Guinness and Jack Hawkins.(n)

programme.title: The Sound of Music
programme.desc: A cheerful novice nun is employed as governess to the seven children of an austere widower. As she brings light, laughter and a love of all things harmonious to a family previously beset by grief and strict discipline she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer and Eleanor Parker.(n)

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: A San Francisco socialite takes a shine to a man she meets by chance, and follows him home to a Californian coastal community. Her arrival coincides with a series of mysterious attacks on people by birds, which soon escalates as vast flocks go on the warpath. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on a Daphne du Maurier short story, starring Tippi Hedren, Rod Taylor, Suzanne Pleshette, Jessica Tandy and Veronica Cartwright.(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: At the end of high-school segregation in the early 1970s, a black teacher struggles to deal with pressures on and off the pitch as he faces his first season as coach of the now racially integrated American football team. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris, Ryan Hurst, Nicole Ari Parker and Donald Faison.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas
programme.desc: Animated sequel to the Oscar-nominated Disney hit, which tells the tale of why the hairy hero of the original disliked the festive season, chronicling an evil plot to turn him against his one true love. With the voices of Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jerry Orbach and David Ogden Stiers.

programme.title: Tarzan II
programme.desc: Growing up in the jungle, the young Tarzan realises he is not quite the same as his simian siblings, and decides to run away. He soon comes across a group of gorillas who send him up a mysterious mountain, where a legendary monster awaits. Disney animated prequel, which goes back in time to the ape man's childhood, with the voices of Harrison Chad, Ron Perlman, Glenn Close and Lance Henriksen.

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure
programme.desc: The fairy and her friends work together to restore the source of their magical power and ensure the world's supply of pixie dust does not run out. However, when Tinker Bell accidentally jeopardises their plans, she must go on a dangerous quest to find a way of putting things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Anjelica Huston, Lucy Liu and Jane Horrocks.

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: A group of lemurs finds a dinosaur egg, and when it hatches, brings the baby lizard up. When a meteor strike destroys their territory, the reptile and his mammal family must go in search of a new home, a quest that leads to dangerous encounters with other creatures. Animated adventure, with the voices of DB Sweeney, Julianna Margulies and Joan Plowright.

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: A battle-hardened military veteran fails to protect a government scientist from assassins. He is assigned to safeguard the dead boffin's family in case the killers come after the top-secret technology in his home, but finds looking after kids proves far tougher than taking on hitmen. Family comedy, starring Vin Diesel and Lauren Graham.

programme.title: The Emperor's New Groove
programme.desc: A spoilt and uncaring emperor learns the importance of treating people fairly when a sorceress turns him into a llama so she can seize power herself. His only hope of getting his kingdom back is to seek the help of a peasant he had previously mistreated. Animated Disney comedy, featuring the voices of David Spade, John Goodman, Patrick Warburton and Eartha Kitt.

Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.

Family comedy, starring Vin Diesel and Lauren Graham.

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp.

programme.title: Tex
programme.desc: A teenager struggles against the odds to take care of his younger brother in the aftermath their mother's death. Drama, starring Matt Dillon, Jim Metzler, Meg Tilly, Bill McKinney, Ben Johnson and Emilio Estevez.

programme.title: Mulan II
programme.desc: The warrior heroine is assigned as a bodyguard to three princesses by the emperor of China. When she learns the girls are to be forced into marriage, she decides to help them escape - jeopardising her relationship with her fiance, who remains loyal to the emperor. Disney animated adventure sequel, with the voices of Ming-Na and Lucy Liu.

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue
programme.desc: Tinker Bell travels to the human world for the first time and befriends a little girl. However, when the child's scientist father discovers the fairy, he takes her away for study in the hope of learning more about the magical creatures. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Mae Whitman and Michael Sheen.

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. He sets off on a journey across America to realise his dream, gathering a crowd of like-minded friends along the way - but the owner of a French restaurant plans to make him the dish of the day. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin.

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers.

programme.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
programme.desc: A map-maker dreams of locating the lost continent of Atlantis - and gets his chance when an eccentric billionaire invites him to join a team of intrepid explorers. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michael J Fox, James Garner, Jim Varney and Leonard Nimoy.

programme.title: Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: A downtrodden handyman is forced to look after his niece and nephew. He soon wins them over with his knack for telling exciting stories, but to their surprise the tall tales start coming true - and as the children make their own suggestions, the results become even more incredible. Fantasy comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce and Russell Brand.

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer.

programme.title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
programme.desc: A couple bury a box containing their wishes for the perfect child they are unable to have. Soon afterwards, a mysterious boy with leaves growing from his feet shows up on their doorstep, claiming to be their son. The strange youngster soon transforms the lives of not only his parents, but their whole community. Fantasy, starring Jennifer Garner and Joel Edgerton.

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers.

He soon wins them over with his knack for telling exciting stories, but to their surprise the tall tales start coming true - and as the children make their own suggestions, the results become even more incredible. Fantasy comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce and Russell Brand.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: A lawyer is left for dead after an ambush in which his Texas ranger brother is killed, but is saved by a mysterious Native American fugitive. Concealing his identity behind a mask, he and his new ally hunt down the outlaws behind the attack - only to find their actions are just part of a larger evil scheme. Western, starring Armie Hammer, Johnny Depp and Helena Bonham Carter.

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the frog is persuaded by his agent that he has a future in movies. He sets off on a journey across America to realise his dream, gathering a crowd of like-minded friends along the way - but the owner of a French restaurant plans to make him the dish of the day. Comedy, starring Dom DeLuise and Charles Durning alongside the puppet characters, with cameos from Mel Brooks, Orson Welles and Steve Martin.

programme.title: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
programme.desc: A noble archer attends a royal contest, but on the way home his father is murdered by henchmen of the wicked King John. He assumes the life of an outlaw, gathering a band of followers in Sherwood Forest and fighting to bring justice to the over-taxed poor and avenge his father's death. Adventure, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.(n)

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: Overprotective police chief James Porter insists on escorting his daughter Melanie on a road trip across America when she is invited for an interview at a prestigious college 800 miles from home - but the journey soon descends into chaos. Family comedy, starring Martin Lawrence, Raven-Symone and Brenda Song.(n)

programme.title: Kronk's New Groove
programme.desc: Inca entrepreneur Kronk is keen to see his restaurant business get off to a good start, especially with his father about to visit. However, the catering industry proves to be more challenging than he ever expected. Animated sequel to Disney's comedy The Emperor's New Groove, with the voices of David Spade, Tracey Ullman, Patrick Warburton, Eartha Kitt and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: With the help of a magical dragon, a lonely orphan boy escapes from a life of servitude with the cruel Gogan family. He makes a fresh start in a seaside town, befriending a lighthouse keeper and her father, but the Gogans are soon on his trail, while a phoney doctor wants the dragon for his travelling show. Part-animated musical fantasy, starring Jim Dale, Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Mickey Rooney and Shelley Winters.(n)

programme.title: Return to Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy is whisked back to Oz in a storm and discovers the evil Nome King has taken over the magical land and turned her old friends to stone. Teaming up with some strange new companions, she sets out to banish him and his monstrous comrades. Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Lou
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated Pixar animation about a pile of lost and found items coming together to teach a toy-stealing schoolyard bully a valuable lesson.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A cursed prince falls for a young woman after she takes the place of her abducted father in his enchanted castle, and only her love can prevent him from remaining a creature forever. Musical fairy tale, starring Emma Watson, Dan Stevens and Luke Evans.(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: The Dragon Spell
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on a quest to save the world of humans and the world of magic, with the aid of an aspiring wizard and feral wild child. Animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Viktor Andrienko, Kate Bristol and Allen Enlow.

programme.title: Super Furry Animals
programme.desc: Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld.

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato and Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Dismissed from the Anti-Villain League after botching a mission, Gru sets off to meet his long-lost twin brother. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker.

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader swings into action to save Gotham City from the Joker. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes and Zach Galifianakis.

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Dismissed from the Anti-Villain League after botching a mission, Gru sets off to meet his long-lost twin brother. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker.

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: Louis & Luca - The Big Cheese Race
programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons

programme.title: Mune: Guardian Of The Moon
programme.desc: Young forest faun Mune embarks on an epic quest to reclaim the sun from the villainous ruler of the underworld. Fantasy animation, featuring the voices of Omar Sy, Izia Higelin and Michael Gregorio.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have rarely been higher and the rivalries never as fierce as Yugi Muto and rival Seto Kaiba return for an epic battle. Animated adventure, with the voices of Dan Green, Eric Stuart and Wayne Grayson.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.

programme.title: Blinky Bill: The Movie
programme.desc: A koala embarks on an epic adventure to find his missing father, teaming up with some pals and venturing into the dangerous Outback. Animated adventure, with the voices of Billy Birmingham, Toni Collette and Charlotte Rose Hamlyn.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: The son of Zeus, king of the Greek gods, is sent to Earth to be raised as a human. When he learns of his immortal heritage, he discovers he can only reclaim his position among the gods by becoming a true hero, so he embarks on a series of adventures and battles fearsome monsters to prove his worth. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tate Donovan, Danny DeVito, James Woods and Rip Torn.

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: A crop duster longs to be a racing plane, but is hamstrung by a fear of heights. With the aid of a veteran flyer, he learns to conquer his phobia and compete against some of the world's greatest flyers in a round-the-world race. Animated adventure spin-off from Pixar's Cars, with the voices of Dane Cook, Teri Hatcher and Stacy Keach.

programme.desc: Disney animated version of the Brothers Grimm story about a princess driven from her home into a sinister forest by her evil stepmother. She is taken in by a group of kindly dwarf miners, but her happiness is threatened when her stepmother returns bearing a poisoned apple. The first ever feature length animated movie, with the voices of Adriana Caselotti and Lucille La Verne.

programme.desc: In the mythical realm of Altera, young hero Lambert is drawn into a bitter conflict between elf princess Liya and her malevolent rival, Elena. Epic animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Ashley Boettcher and GK Bowes.(n)

Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee.(n)

programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher.(n)
